EmailTemplate.name: Email Project.Export Holds Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Export Holds Inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Export Holds Inquiry
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting the Honeywell Aerospace U.S. Export Team. We’ve already started working on your {!Case.Subject} inquiry.
Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. You can use this number to track our progress.
Questions
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, if you need to reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
{!Case.Additional_Web_Form_Info__c}
